metadata.title: CVE-2018-1110 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in knot-resolver before version 2.3.0. Malformed DNSmessages may cause denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1110` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

knot-resolver - 3.2.1-3
knot-resolver-module-http - 3.2.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: knot-resolver package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.1-3').
